attributes.action: Implement a policy promoting equal opportunity not equal representation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A number of recent campaigns and policies implemented by the government appear to be calling for equal representation by calling for people to be hired, placed in position of authority, or simply selected based upon their race or gender.

As this its self is a form of discrimination and I request that the government put pressure on all sectors of society and implement policies that ensure that people are not selected in any form based upon gender, race or age.
